message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SI. 

This paper deals with the problem of summarizing massive document streams, which is a common task in information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The use of sequential decision making also suggests a connection to reinforcement learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the focus on real-time processing and scalability makes social and information networks (cs.SI) a possible category as well.
